{"content":"The following is the commit files that have changed: {
  "sha": "52375c9465be1d33c7d2e595461098eadbb0a3dd",
  "filename": "docs/id-governance/access-review-agent.md",
  "status": "modified",
  "additions": 1,
  "deletions": 1,
  "changes": 2,
  "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/1ef4a1223219ee5ca39ec06cd6e7ec0b3e413b56/docs%2Fid-governance%2Faccess-review-agent.md",
  "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/1ef4a1223219ee5ca39ec06cd6e7ec0b3e413b56/docs%2Fid-governance%2Faccess-review-agent.md",
  "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fid-governance%2Faccess-review-agent.md?ref=1ef4a1223219ee5ca39ec06cd6e7ec0b3e413b56",
  "patch": "@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@ Say goodbye to time-consuming research and the uncertainty of rushed decisions.\n ## Prerequisites\n - You must have [Microsoft Entra ID Governance or Microsoft Entra Suite licenses](licensing-fundamentals.md).\n - You must [Onboard to Security Copilot](/copilot/security/get-started-security-copilot#onboarding-to-security-copilot) with at least one [security compute unit (SCU)](/copilot/security/manage-usage) provisioned.\n-   - Completing an access review that includes 20 decisions consumes on average one SCU. This includes the agent gathering insights and generating recommendations and the reviewer's natural language conversation in Microsoft Teams with the agent. The SCU consumption can vary based on the conversation length between the reviewer and agent.\n+   - Completing an access review that includes 20 decisions consumes on average 4.5 SCU. This includes the agent gathering insights and generating recommendations and the reviewer's natural language conversation in Microsoft Teams with the agent. The SCU consumption can vary based on the conversation length between the reviewer and agent.\n - Admins must have at least **all** the following roles to set up and manage the agent in the Microsoft Entra admin center:\n    - [Identity Governance  Administrator](../identity/role-based-access-control/permissions-reference.md#identity-governance-administrator)\n    - [Lifecycle Workflows Administrator](../identity/role-based-access-control/permissions-reference.md#lifecycle-workflows-administrator)"
}. Please summarise it in a few sentences, using UK grammar and ensure the response is formatted for markdown. Do not start the response with here is summary.","role":"user"}
ai_summary.Response: This commit updates the documentation for the access review agent. It clarifies the consumption of Security Compute Units (SCUs) per access review, changing the average from one SCU to 4.5 SCU for twenty decisions. This adjustment accounts for the agent's insight gathering, recommendation generation, and the reviewer's conversational interaction.
